definitions.definition: apply a substance such as oil or grease to (an engine or component) to minimize friction and allow smooth movement.
examples: remove the nut and lubricate the thread
synonyms: ease; informallube "avoid stuck or frozen doors by lubricating the hinges"

examples: the availability of credit lubricated the channels of trade
synonyms: ease; informallube "avoid stuck or frozen doors by lubricating the hinges"

examples: men lubricated with alcohol speak their true feelings
